mapper.insert:
insert into rule_violation_info (rule_id, file_path_hash, file_path, line, lineno, merge_id, message, shielded, commit_request_to_shield, time) values
(#{item.ruleId}, #{item.filePathHash}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.line}, #{item.lineno}, #{item.mergeId}, #{item.message}, #{item.shielded}, #{item.commitRequestToShield}, #{item.time})
